hook.text: The government's master plan: a committee to form committees about committees.

segments.text: Good evening. The government has unveiled its master plan.
A committee to form a committee about committees.
(Cutaway - Stewie-style minister in a lavish room)
Gentlemen, I propose we form a sub-committee.
To discuss the forming of further committees.
(Room full of identical officials nod vigorously)
In related news, the Committee Committee has formed a Committee Committee Committee.
